title: Prompt Engineering Pathway
description: Master the art of crafting effective prompts for large language models and multimodal AI systems, from fundamentals to advanced structured outputs.
overview: This pathway teaches how to craft effective prompts for large language models and multimodal AI systems. It moves from fundamentals (clear text prompts) to advanced strategies (structured outputs, tool-calling, multimodal prompts). The focus is on creative control and practical application.
prerequisites: Access to AI tools (free accounts work)
learningOutcomes: Write clear and effective prompts for AI models
Apply structured prompting techniques and patterns
Create multimodal prompts for text, images, and structured outputs
Design prompt-based systems for real applications
Understand prompt optimization and testing strategies
Build practical projects using advanced prompting
